mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.label_name, t2.label_color from (select time_task.label_id, sum(duration) sum_duration from time_user_task, time_task where time_user_task.user_id = #{taskVo.userId} and time_task.task_id = time_user_task.task_id and time_task.flag=0 and date(time_task.create_time) = #{taskVo.nowDate} GROUP BY label_id)as t1 left join time_label t2 on t1.label_id = t2.label_id

select t1.*, t2.label_name, t2.label_color from (select time_task.label_id, sum(duration) sum_duration from time_user_task, time_task where time_user_task.user_id = #{taskVo.userId} and time_task.task_id = time_user_task.task_id and time_task.flag=0 and date(time_task.update_time) >= #{taskVo.startDateCondition} and date(time_task.update_time) <= #{taskVo.endDateCondition} GROUP BY label_id)as t1 left join time_label t2 on t1.label_id = t2.label_id

select time_task.priority , time_user_task.user_id, sum(duration) sum_duration from time_user_task, time_task where time_user_task.user_id = #{taskVo.userId} and time_task.task_id = time_user_task.task_id and time_task.flag=0 and date(time_task.create_time)= #{taskVo.nowDate} GROUP BY priority
